title: Can we pray behind an imam who believes Allah is everywhere? - #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: foreign those who believe that Allah is everywhere definitely are against the teachings of the Quran the teachings of the Prophet Muhammad of Allah starting with the companions and most likely such people have misunderstanding of the texts of the Quran and of the Sunnah due to either their ignorance or pure misunderstanding and following their imams so such people like ashara maturity and the likes who say that Allah is everywhere and that Allah is not on his throne definitely are in great and huge mistake which is sinful by No Doubt however the scholars say that we do not get them out of the fold of Islam due to the fact that there is something blocking their attack fear and that is their misunderstanding or will so misinterpreting misinterpreting or understanding the issues of alistiwa and the likes blocks us from giving them take fear yet it does not stop us from saying that they are committing a grave mistake and a sin that has to be rectified and Allah Knows Best so in short yes you can pray behind them inshallah
